subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Adreian Payne scored 26 points as No. 2 Michigan State avoided a stunning upset Friday night, holding off visiting Columbia, 62-53, in the final minutes.
snippet: Adreian Payne scored 26 points as No. 2 Michigan State avoided a stunning upset Friday night, holding off visiting Columbia, 62-53, in the final minutes.
